title: Anitrack
description: Chrome extension integrating with online service Anilist to enhance and provide additional features.

title: AzLTables
description: Gather information from the Azur Lane wiki and view all your collected information in one place, displayed in an easy-to-view format. Fleet management functions included.

title: expandimgur
description: Revamp Imgur's user image pages by increasing support for wider screens in addition to other small modifications.

title: AzLEList
description: A site for organising Azur Lane Equipment data. Perform sorts and mark your own equipment for faster reference and comparison.

title: Ellephant
description: A Kantai Collection viewer with a focus on providing only the most relevant information and look good while doing it.

title: steamtiles
description: Designed to enhance the Steam store browsing experience by showing each games' header image.

title: imgurtabber
description: Mobile-intended website for opening many links in new tabs at once.

title: ABDUCTION
description: 2d side-scrolling danmaku game made for the UMBC games development class. Pick up people and drop them, and don't get hit.

title: anirandomise
description: Have a folder full of videos and don't know what to watch?  This Python script chooses for you.  Includes logging capabilities if you're paranoid it's been picking the same thing over and over again (it might actually be).

title: Distractlands
description: UMBC software engineering political districting project. Uses Google Maps API to colour Maryland pretty colours, and is very Red. I don't know what political districting is, I just made the front-end.

title: bgmswitcher
description: A website that lets you [relatively] seamlessly switch between the sounds of chosen YouTube videos at will.

title: BShuffle
description: Chrome extension that compensates for the Bandcamp web service's overwhelming lack of a shuffle button.

title: Anigen
description: Website for production of graphical Television Program Charts based on data from a user's Anilist account for any particular year and season.

title: IgAViewer
description: Website for advanced viewing of an Imgur Album.

title: fcardsK
description: Mobile website for Kanji practise with a unique system while looking like a rainbow.
